p: Besides, both the EAF and CF caused increment of urinary Na +, K +, and Cl âˆ’ excretion with significant alkalization of urine. As a result, the diuretic activity of the EAF and CF may be different from loop-like diuretics because loop diuretics cause marked natriuresis and urine acidification [ 16]. It is reasonable to suggest that the constituent(s) present in the root bark of C. myricoides seems to have different diuretic mechanisms of action.
